1.0.name: wordpress/audio-player-widget
1.0.description:
Audio Player Widget is a small plugin that provides support for using the Audio-Player plugin in WordPress sidebars.

The Audio Player Widget requires Martin Laine's WordPress Audio Player plugin.

  • Homepage for Audio Player: http://wpaudioplayer.com/.
  • WordPress Plugin Page for Audio Player: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/audio-player/

Using the Audio Player Widget is simple. If your theme supports widgets and you have the Audio Player plugin installed, you can drag the widget to the sidebar and specify a label and URL for an MP3 file. The widget will render the Audio Player in the sidebar when the page is loaded by dynamically generating the [audio:URL] tag the Audio Player plugin requires.
